5 CLS:MC=16384
11 PRINT"26 0 "
12 PRINT"3   32"
13 PRINT"3515"
14 PRINT"1219"
15 PRINT"284"
16 PRINT"721"
17 PRINT" 292"
18 PRINT" 1825"
19 PRINT" 2217"
20 PRINT"934"
21 PRINT"316"
22 PRINT"1427"
23 PRINT"2013"
24 PRINT"136"
25 PRINT"33125128311"
26 PRINT"64030";
50 FORT=1TO74:READA,B:PRINT@26,T;:POKEA,B-64
60 I$=INKEY$:IFI$=""THEN60
70 NEXT
99 GOTO99
100 I$=INKEY$:IFI$=""THEN100
210 IFI$="A"THENGOSUB300:X=X-1:GOSUB310
220 IFI$="S"THENGOSUB300:X=X+1:GOSUB310
230 IFI$="Z"THENGOSUB300:Y=Y+1:GOSUB310
240 IFI$="W"THENGOSUB300:Y=Y-1:GOSUB310
245 IFI$=" "THENGOSUB320
250 GOTO100
300 POKEMC+32*Y+X,P:RETURN
310 P=PEEK(MC+32*Y+X):POKEMC+32*Y+X,42:RETURN
320 LPRINTMC+32*Y+X;",";P:RETURN
